document.full_text: people have been tortured in tunisia since the revolution which toppled its ruler four months ago, a united nations special rapporteur said on saturday, although he said the practice did not seem to be systematic.
document.title: people still tortured in tunisia: u.n. rapporteur
lines_and_colors: people have been tortured in tunisia since the revolution which toppled its ruler four months ago, a united nations special rapporteur said on saturday, although he said the practice did not seem to be systematic.
